channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Avec 350 € de remise et deux batteries supplémentaires, ce pack DJI Avata 2 vaut clairement le détour
item.description: L'Avata 2 est un as de la cabriole, facile à prendre en main grâce au casque Goggles 3 fourni. Chez Amazon, vous pourrez le retrouver dans un pack à 849,99 euros qui se compose notamment de trois batteries pour un temps de vol de 69 minutes.

item.title: The Philips Baristina is the most affordable bean-to-cup coffee maker I've ever tested — and it's seriously impressive
item.description: A bargain espresso machine that makes brewing with fresh beans as simple as using coffee pods.

item.title: Solaire et éolien abîment-ils les réacteurs nucléaires ? La réponse d’EDF
item.description: EDF enregistre des surcoûts liés à l’exploitation de ses centrales nucléaires, et les renouvelables y sont pour quelque chose. Mais pas seulement : la France est aussi beaucoup moins énergivore que prévu.

item.title: Free s’apprête à déployer ses premiers sites 5G 2,1 GHz, voici où ils seront situés
item.description: Après avoir discrètement annoncé l'arrivée de la 5G 2,1 GHz, Free commence à déclarer les sites où elle sera accessible.

item.title: Anthropic launches new push for enterprise agents with plugins for finance, engineering, and design
item.description: It's a major opportunity to grow Anthropic’s enterprise client base — and a significant threat to SaaS products currently performing those functions.

item.title: Ubisoft appoints three Assassin's Creed veterans to oversee the franchise at newly formed Vantage Studios
item.description: Ubisoft has named three experienced Assassin's Creed developers to lead the franchise at the company's newly formed Tencent-funded subsidiary, Vantage Studios.

item.title: Microsoft has big plans for the next generation of SharePoint - and it might be the best way to get users to not hate it so much any more
item.description: Microsoft has given us the first look at a fresh new SharePoint design, as sharing with M365 is also set to get easier and smarter.

item.title: Spain's LaLiga blocks US government's VPN-enabled Freedom.gov in piracy crackdown
item.description: Freedom.gov goes dark in Spain as football league nukes Cloudflare IPs. Here's all we know.

item.title: How Claude Code Claude Codes
item.description: Claude Code is a developer tool for developers. And yet, over the last year and especially the last few months, the team at Anthropic has seen a huge number of people, across industries and disciplines, figure out how to access their terminal so that they could build new stuff too. Few AI products have found […]

item.title: Spotify pourrait vous demander directement vos préférences musicales
item.description: L’application de streaming musical travaille sur une nouvelle fonctionnalité permettant d’influencer directement vos recommandations.

item.title: JBL Bandbox Solo Review: An AI Speaker You Can Actually Love
item.description: AI tools in music don't have to be slop.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy S26 : les offres de précommande fuitent, pourquoi il ne faut surtout pas acheter la version 256 Go
item.description: À quelques heures de l'annonce officielle, les bonus de précommande des Galaxy S26 se dévoilent. Voici tout ce qu'il faut savoir et comment maximiser vos économies.

item.title: Conduent data breach grows, affecting at least 25M people
item.description: The number of people affected by a data breach at government contractor giant Conduent is growing, as millions of people continue to receive notices warning them that hackers stole their personal data.

item.title: Ryan Coogler's X-Files reboot gets the green light at Hulu
item.description: Good news for all Ryan Coogler fans: The Sinners director is bringing back a beloved TV show. Hulu has officially green lit a pilot of Coogler's X-Files reboot, a project three years in the making, Deadline reports. Coogler has a five-year exclusive television deal with Disney, Hulu's parent company. Coogler is directing and writing the pilot episode, with Jennifer Yale coming on as showrunner. She previously held the role on The Copenhagen Test. Actress Danielle Deadwyler, known for roles in Till and The Harder They Fall, has signed on as co-lead. The show will follow the original storylin...

item.title: NYC transit workers hit by Qilin ransomware - thousands of members possibly affected
item.description: Qilin hits the Local 100 of TWA, leaking sensitive member data to the dark web.

item.title: On a joué avec ce PC de science-fiction signé Kojima à plus de 4 000 euros
item.description: Asus et Kojima Productions lancent le ROG Flow Z13 KJP, une tablette gaming unique au design inspiré des jeux de Kojima. Le PC offre des performances solides, capable de faire tourner des jeux en 1080p avec FreeSync Premium, mais peut atteindre le QHD avec quelques limitations.

item.title: ‘Super Mario Galaxy Movie’ Might Bring Another Nintendo Legend to the Big Screen
item.description: Plus, the next Jurassic World may have a title.

item.title: Tide’s Evo Tiles Are a Fresh, Overengineered Take on the Tide Pod
item.description: Tide’s Evo Tiles are lightweight, fibrous squares of detergent that simplify the laundry process—and also act as a slightly more eco-friendly alternative to the Tide Pod.

item.title: Samsung is on slop watch at Unpacked
item.description: Another Unpacked is nearly upon us. On February 25th, Samsung is expected to announce the Galaxy S26 series of flagship phones - potentially including the S26, S26 Plus, and S26 Ultra - with another round of AI-based features. That will come as a surprise to nobody. But as more AI creeps in on Samsung's AI […]

item.title: This Chainsmokers-approved AI music producer is joining Google
item.description: ProducerAI, an AI-powered music-making platform, is joining Google. As part of the deal, Google will fold ProducerAI under the Labs umbrella and power the tool with a preview version of its new Lyria 3 music-making AI model. ProducerAI is a music-making platform that allows users to work with an AI agent to generate sounds, workshop […]

item.title: This limited edition Death Stranding-inspired tablet is the coolest computer I’ve ever touched
item.description: The Asus ROG Flow Z13 was already a unique beast. It's a chunky gaming tablet with impressive AMD Strix Halo integrated graphics. I was really into it when I reviewed it around this time last year. But just look at it now, clad in the stylings of Hideo Kojima's game studio and his longtime collaborator, […]

item.title: Mogul says it has tracked $1.5B in music royalties, raised $5M in funding
item.description: Mogul, which helps artists track royalties and value their catalogs, raised $5 million in a round led by the Yamaha Music Innovations Fund.

item.title: It’s time to pull the plug on plug-in hybrids
item.description: Plug-in hybrid vehicles are rarely charged, according to a new study. Why are automakers still producing them?

item.title: New Relic launches new AI agent platform and OpenTelemetry tools
item.description: New Relic is giving enterprises more observability tools, letting them create and manage AI agents, and better integrate OTel data streams.

item.title: Waymo robotaxis are now operating in 10 US cities
item.description: Waymo launched services today in Dallas, Houston, San Antonio, and Orlando.

item.title: What is the release date for the Scrubs revival's two-episode premiere on Hulu and Disney+?
item.description: Beloved medical sitcom Scrubs returns for its 10th season shortly — this is when you can watch it.

item.title: Seattle Ultrasonics C-200 review: This is the future of kitchen knives
item.description: There’s a type of knife tech often seen in science fiction that revolves around vibrating a blade to increase its sharpness. We’ve seen examples of this in franchises like Star Wars (vibroblades), Evangelion (the prog knife), Dune (pulse-swords) and the Marvel universe (vibranium), but what might surprise you is that the underlying science is sound. By vibrating a cutting tool at high frequencies, not only do you reduce friction, you essentially turn the blade into a saw, as tiny oscillations enhance the inherent sharpness of a blade. However, up until recently, this tech largely only existed...

item.title: Companies are doubling down on AI - despite market warnings
item.description: Most businesses expect to invest in AI, however workers need to be upskilled and jobs need to be redefined.

item.title: Meta may trade AI chips for shares in its latest AMD deal
item.description: Meta has struck a deal with AMD to buy up to six gigawatts worth of AI chips, both companies announced. The agreement is structured in a way that could see AMD issue Meta up to 160 million shares of its common stock provided GPU shipment milestones are achieved — meaning Meta could own up to 10 percent of AMD if the deal fully completes. Meta plans to purchase six gigawatts of AMD's Instinct GPUs based on the MI450 architecture and optimized for Meta's workloads, with the first gigawatt deployment set to begin in the second half of 2026. AMD and Meta will also expand on their EPYC CPU partner...

item.title: Le Xiaomi Redmi 15C 5G 256 Go en promo à 169 € combine batterie XXL, grand écran et stockage généreux pour un prix mini
item.description: Doté d’une batterie XXL de 6 000 mAh, d’un écran de 6,9 pouces fluide et d’une interface HyperOS bien maîtrisée, le Xiaomi Redmi 15C est un smartphone complet à petit prix sans se ruiner : il est d'ailleurs en promo à 169 euros contre 213 euros de base pour sa version 256 Go.

item.title: Garmin : une pluie de nouvelles fonctionnalités gratuites débarque sur votre montre connectée
item.description: Garmin a annoncé sa mise à jour de février 2026 pour l'ensemble de sa gamme de montres connectées. De quoi profiter de plans d'entraînement pour le fitness, de nouvelles fonctions de suivi du sommeil ou d'un suivi des appareils sportifs.

item.title: More Shohei Ohtani content is coming to TikTok
item.description: Major League Baseball wants more of a footprint on TikTok. Just in time for spring training, the two companies announced Tuesday they were partnering to expand baseball content on TikTok, including creating an MLB hub in the app and, of course, bringing in more influencers. Baseball is coming back after a season that was especially […]

item.title: Grosses performances d’Apple et d’Honor en Europe l’an dernier
item.description: Les consommateurs européens plébiscitent l'iPhone. Apple affiche un record en termes de part de marché pour 2025, et a même écoulé davantage de smartphones que Samsung au dernier trimestre. Belle performance aussi de la part d'Honor.

item.title: ‘If AI is the only place people feel heard, that’s a societal problem’ — why one charity is pushing back on mental health chatbots
item.description: A growing number of people are turning to AI for mental health support due to cost and accessibility — but charities warn it’s risky and are offering safer, free alternatives

item.title: Quels sont les meilleurs écouteurs sans fil pour le sport en 2026 ?
item.description: Si vous êtes sportif ou sportive, que cela soit occasionnel ou régulier, peut-être aimez-vous faire vos exercices en musique. Nous avons donc préparé pour vous une sélection des meilleurs écouteurs sans fil pour faire du sport.

item.title: Forget Starlink – this PS5-sized device promises to deliver fiber-like 25Gbps internet speeds using invisible beams of light
item.description: The Taara Beam sends 25Gbps internet speeds over invisible light waves and could rival Starlink.

item.title: Kit out your PlayStation Portal in one fell swoop with this excellent officially licensed accessory bundle discounted at PS Direct
item.description: This PlayStation Portal accessory bundle has all you need to protect your new handheld — and now it's a real bargain at PS Direct.

item.title: The BBC Is Open to Letting Americans Fund ‘Doctor Who’ Again
item.description: The BBC's Lindsay Salt called the show a 'treasured brand' and is open to another collaboration even after its Disney drama.

item.title: 6 Best 2-in-1 Laptops (2026), WIRED-Approved and Tested
item.description: These 2-in-1 computers upgrade the norm with touchscreen displays, 360-degree hinges, and detachable keyboards.

item.title: Nimble raises $47M to give AI agents access to real-time web data
item.description: Nimble uses AI agents to search the web, verify and validate the results, and then clean and structure the information into neat tables that can then be queried like a database.

item.title: The AeroPress just got a stainless steel upgrade — and it’s perfect for travel
item.description: The iconic coffee brewer is now available in vacuum-insulated stainless steel, with an extra-large capacity for bigger brews anywhere.

item.title: Neuroscience says you can alter your brain structure to improve cognition. Here’s how—it’s already a popular hobby
item.description: This brain training hack is literally for the birds, says a new study. Neuroscientists have found birding is actually a brain hack. A new study published in JNeurosci, the Journal of Neuroscience found birdwatching may actually alter the structure and function of your brain—what is known as neuroplasticity—effectively helping to boost cognitive abilities, especially in more seasoned bird watchers....
